description.value: You have an eye for angles and can find shots that others believe are impossible. When using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ricochet Shot], you can bounce your bullet off up to two solid surfaces within your weapon's first range increment instead of just one. In addition, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] the first time you attack it with a Ricochet Shot during an encounter.
